# Title
Acquisition of a Constant Climate Chamber

## Reference Number
cb-438-949005, Rev. 4

## Tender Details
### Title
Acquisition of a Constant Climate Chamber
### Reference Number
cb-438-949005
### Notice Type
Request for Proposal
### Solicitation Number
24-58045-B
### Modification Number
4
### Publication Date
June 17, 2024
### Tender Closing Date
July 18, 2024, 14:00:00

### Contract Details
#### Expected Contract Start Date
July 26, 2024
#### Expected Contract End Date
October 30, 2024

### Category and Location
* Category: Goods and Services
* Location: Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

### Supply Description
The Canadian government is seeking proposals for the acquisition of a constant climate chamber. The chamber will support the testing and evaluation of building envelope materials under controlled environmental conditions, simulating various climatic scenarios.

### Selection and Evaluation Criteria
* The evaluation of proposals will be based on a combination of technical, financial, and quality factors.
* The chamber must meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation documents.

### Trade Agreements and Regulations
* This tender is open to bids from qualified suppliers who agree to comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
